General.Name: Saudi Public Transport Co.
General.Description: Saudi Public Transport Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of transportation services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. It operates through Passenger Transport, Specialized Services, and Public Transportation Project segments. The company offers urban bus transportation services for passengers on specific lines on the network; intercity bus transportation services between cities; and international bus transportation for passengers from cities in the kingdom to the neighboring Gulf and Arab countries including United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, and Egypt, as well as VIP Express services. It also provides bus charter services for umrah pilgrims and visitors, tours and tourists, archaeological sites, and school and university trips, as well as international transportation; self-driving vehicles and limousine services; and electric bus services for transportation within the university campus in Jeddah. In addition, the company transports non-postal parcels and cargo; provides car rental services; operates and maintains trains, metros, motor vehicles, and trucks; and organizes tours. Further, it offers Rekab, a smart on-demand mobility service. Additionally, the company imports spare parts and chemical detergents of vehicles. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
